item.description:
Yankee Swaps are Fun!!! Limit of $10 or re-gifts are always welcome ! !

AND, we are celebrating Micki's 69th - so let's get it going :)

They just kept walking in the door! Even got one that was just buying a pizza named Brad :) So! Come on down and join us for good friends, good food and G*R*E*A*T* cribbage :)

AND don’t forget about the yodeling Pickle – come on down to find out all about this new musical!

AND, Let's Play Cribbage!!
item.how_to_find_us: Cribbage Boards will be out in the Back Room !
item.name: Waltham Cribbage Meet-Up: Welcome to 2010 with a Yankee Swap ! !
